title: Prompt Quality Index (PQI) v0.2.1 — The Architecture of Limitation in Code
description: PQI (Prompt Quality Index) is a privacy-first, local, modular framework that evaluates the ethical and structural quality of human–AI prompts. Version 0.2.1 introduces the Architecture of Limitation: a self-auditing layer for reproducibility, transparency, and proportion in AI dialogue design. Includes full audit chain, radar visualization restoration, and reproducible documentation suite.
notes: Developed collaboratively through The Solace Dialogues framework — bridging philosophical insight and applied AI ethics. Includes Emily’s Waffle Filter™ as a relevance calibration test.
